title: Bad Moon on the Rise
description: From the world of The Twenty-Sided Sorceress comes a bold new Urban Fantasy series!Tiger-shifter. Bounty hunter. Vigilante for hire.Kira Jones solves her problems with a big gun and she rarely has the same problem twice. But as Kira's friends often joke, eventually she'll run into a situation she can't solve with a gun. Maybe sooner than later...This is the first book in the Six-Gun Shifters series following Alek's sister Kira and her crew on their adventures in vigilante justice. This series stands entirely on its own.
author: Annie Bellet
